title: PBE Client and Selector
body: I looked to see how if I was chosen and it had told me that i was picked for it so i downloaded it but then something happened so I refreshed the page and now i can't make my account. I would really like to get it so i can get on PBE servers as soon as I can thanks!

replies.body: Have y'all got it cleared up like am i getting PBE account or what? I'm just wondering
I didn't try for another account, i just know i logged on and said i was submitted and i got the download then i came back to the page and it said it was pending thank you for working to fix it!

Looking into this for you, it looks like this account has submitted an application but it's not yet approved.  It's possible that another account you might own was accepted.  Hope that helps clear things up!
